org.atmosphere.vibe.server

Interface AbstractServerSocket<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ServerSocket
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Sentence

    public interface AbstractServerSocket<T>
    AbstractSocket consists of a set of common functionality of Sentence and ServerSocket.
    Author:
    Donghwan Kim

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T close()
      Closes the socket.
      T send(String event)
      Sends a given event without data.
      T send(String event, Object data)
      Sends a given event with data.
      T tag(String... names)
      Attaches given tags to the socket.
      T untag(String... names)
      Detaches given tags from the socket.
